name: Lil'Robolab
description:
Is it a board game or just and experiment?

Lil'Robolab is a puzzle games' prototype just like a traditional board game. Our goal is to bring Lapis, our Little robot, the exit. But the way will not be easy...

Spikes, bulldozers, lasers and some other dangers that will block her way until the goal. Will Lapis be able to achieve her goal? That depends on you

updated v0.2:

- optimized control camera
